history.proof: intros x y u. unfold prod_scal. simpl. qsimpl use: ModuleSpace. qsimpl use: ModuleSpace,scal_distr_r. sauto q: on depth: 3.

exceptions.exn: The LHS of ModuleSpace.ax1 (ModuleSpace.scal _ _ _ _ (ModuleSpace.scal _ _ _ _ _)) does not match any subterm of the goal
The LHS of scal_distr_r (scal (plus _ _) _) does not match any subterm of the goal

In environment K : Ring U, V : ModuleSpace K x, y : K u0 : U u1 : V H : forall (x y : K) (u : V), scal (plus x y) u = plus (scal x u) (scal y u) Unable to unify "(scal (mult x y) u0, scal (mult x y) u1)" with "(scal x (scal y u0), scal x (scal y u1))".

original: intros x y u. unfold prod_scal. simpl. rewrite ModuleSpace.ax1. rewrite scal_distr_r. reflexivity.
